comment: /** * true if detailed information about each segment should be returned, * false otherwise. */
code: /** * true if detailed information about each segment should be returned, * false otherwise. */ public boolean verbose() { return verbose. }
/** * Sets the verbose option. * @see #verbose() */ public void verbose(boolean v) { verbose = v. }
@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeBoolean(verbose). }
@Override public void readFrom(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     super.readFrom(in).     verbose = in.readBoolean(). }
